column5: I figured if my artificial crusade goes poorly on the next trip, I better have a back-up. I don't want to go home skunked 3 times fishing perch and sunfish. lol  I bought some of the pre-packaged preserved waxies from CTC. Figured it's worth a try. Anyone else tried them? Are they as good as live stuff, or even close?
I i tried them and they didn't work very well for me
I tried them today and it was the old skunkaroo here too.
Ya I bought some too during the early season. They smell like alcohol. They were obviously designed to attract the fisherman not the fish.
